backend/main.mo: Main backend actor integrating storage, auth, user profiles, posts, comments, likes, reporting, and post ordering with persistent state.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old posts to a new format by adding an empty likedBy set and returning an updated actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting frontend handling of duplicate-like attempts with linked file and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files describing components, hooks, validation, moderation, and UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining light/dark theme variables and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, app icons, manifest, and mounting the React root element.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Web app manifest defining PWA metadata, icons, theme color, and display mode.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, profile loading watchdog, error states, and navigation between pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapEr: Error screen component showing friendly messages, technical details, and retry/logout actions when bootstrap fails.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Login screen with branding and Internet Identity sign-in button including loading state.
frontend/src/components/feed/CommentsThr: Renders a post’s comments, handles adding, liking, deleting, and reporting comments with validation and suspension checks.
frontend/src/components/feed/DeleteComme: Confirmation dialog for deleting a comment, performing the delete mutation and showing toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/feed/DeletePostD: Confirmation dialog for deleting a post and its comments using a delete mutation with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/feed/PostCard.ts: Displays a post with author info, content, actions, liking, reporting, deleting, and an expandable comments thread.
Provides the main app layout with header, share and notification controls, content area, and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/nav/BottomNav.ts: Bottom navigation bar allowing users to switch between core app pages like feed, create, polls, and profile.
frontend/src/components/polls/WeeklyPoll: Shows the weekly poll, allowing voting or viewing results depending on poll state.
frontend/src/components/profile/Username: Modal for choosing and validating a unique username, submitting via mutation with error handling.
frontend/src/components/reporting/Report: Confirmation dialog that reports a user account via mutateAsync and shows toast messages.
Dialog for reporting a comment, triggering mutation, local notification, and toast feedback.
Dialog to report a post, submitting a mutation and adding a local notification for the reporter.
frontend/src/constants/uploads.ts: Defines allowed image MIME types and a 5MB upload size limit.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for managing Internet Identity authentication and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating posts, profiles, and user data using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSuspensionStatus.t: Determines whether the current user is suspended and returns suspension end time.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and color variables for light and dark themes with utility resets.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
Defines prohibited terms and utilities for normalizing text and detecting disallowed content.
frontend/src/moderation/validateTextCont: Validates text content for emptiness and inappropriate terms.
frontend/src/moderation/validateUsername: Validates usernames for length, character rules, and disallowed terms.
frontend/src/notifications/localNotifica: Manages per-user notifications in localStorage, including retrieval, creation, read-state updates, and unread counts.
frontend/src/notifications/notificationT: Defines notification types and the Notification interface structure.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: UI for creating posts with text and optional image upload, including validation, suspension checks, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays the main feed of posts with refresh controls and includes the weekly poll panel.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows stored notifications for the current user with icons and read-state handling.
frontend/src/pages/PollsPage.tsx: Renders the weekly poll panel on its own page.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows user profile info, suspension warnings, sharing options, and logout handling.
frontend/src/polls/extractWeeklyTopics.t: Extracts top topic keywords from posts/comments using normalized word frequency and stopword filtering.
frontend/src/polls/localPollStore.ts: Stores weekly poll data per user in localStorage, including creation, retrieval, and voting logic.
frontend/src/polls/pollTimeWindow.ts: Provides time-window rules and helpers for weekly poll availability, voting, and results.
frontend/src/polls/useWeeklyPoll.ts: React hook managing poll lifecycle, topic generation, voting, and poll-availability notifications.
frontend/src/utils/imageFileValidation.t: Validates image files by checking allowed MIME types and enforcing a maximum size limit.
frontend/src/utils/shareHornetHive.ts: Implements a share utility using Web Share API with clipboard and legacy fallbacks, plus helpers for copying links and checking support.
frontend/src/utils/timeFormat.ts: Formats timestamps into relative time strings or readable suspension end dates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for extracting, storing, retrieving, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout that rejects if it exceeds a specified duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing state, issues, and feature requests related to enforcing one-like-per-student-per-post.
